      • reset

        public void reset()

      • getCoords

        public int[] getCoords​(java.lang.String userCoords)
        Used to turn a combination of letters A-D and 0-8 to an array of 3 indexes.
        Parameters:
        userCoords - A combination a letters A-D and 0-8
        Returns:
        An array of 3 indexes indicating quadrants and x, y within them

      • isField

        public boolean isField​(int quad,
                       int x,
                       int y)
        Check if this field exists.
        Parameters:
        quad - The quadrant to look at
        x - x position
        y - y position
        Returns:
        true if field exists, false if not

      • isField

        public boolean isField​(java.lang.String userCoords)
        Translates coords in format [A-D][0-8] to 3 indexes and then calls itself with coords.
        Parameters:
        userCoords - [A-D][0-8]
        Returns:
        true if field exists, false if not

        Returns:

      • deepCopy

        public Board deepCopy()
